text: Sangya Balya (Kannada: ಸಂಗ್ಯಾ ಬಾಳ್ಯಾ) is a 1992 Indian Kannada film directed by Sundar Krishna Urs. The film's story is based on folktale of same name, written more than hundred years earlier. The music was scored by Vijaya Bhaskar. ==Cast== * Ramakrishna * Vijay Kashi * Sundar Krishna Urs * Umashree * Avinash == Soundtrack == ==References== ==External links== * Sangya Balya on Youtube Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Kannada- language films Category:Kannada-language films
title: Sangya Balya
